init(String, Color, Color, JTextComponent) - Static method in class org.jdesktop.xswingx.PromptSupport
Convenience method to set the promptText and promptTextColor on a JTextComponent.
install(JXSearchField) - Method in class org.jdesktop.xswingx.RecentSearches
Install a recent the searches popup menu returned by RecentSearches.createPopupMenu(JXSearchField) on searchField.
installUI(JComponent) - Method in class org.jdesktop.xswingx.plaf.basic.BasicSearchFieldUI
Calls BasicSearchFieldUI.installDefaults(), adds the search, clear and popup button to the search field and registers a PropertyChangeListener ad DocumentListener and an ActionListener on the popup button.
installUI(JComponent) - Method in class org.jdesktop.xswingx.plaf.PromptTextUI
Calls TextUI#installUI(JComponent) on the delegate and installs a focus listener on c which repaints the component when it gains or loses the focus.
isInstantSearchMode() - Method in class org.jdesktop.xswingx.JXSearchField
Returns true if the current JXSearchField.SearchMode is JXSearchField.SearchMode.INSTANT.
isMacLayoutStyle() - Method in class org.jdesktop.xswingx.JXSearchField
Returns true if the current JXSearchField.LayoutStyle is JXSearchField.LayoutStyle.MAC.
isRegularSearchMode() - Method in class org.jdesktop.xswingx.JXSearchField
Returns true if the current JXSearchField.SearchMode is JXSearchField.SearchMode.REGULAR.
isUseSeperatePopupButton() - Method in class org.jdesktop.xswingx.JXSearchField
Returns true if the popup button should be visible and used for displaying the search popup menu.
isVistaLayoutStyle() - Method in class org.jdesktop.xswingx.JXSearchField
Returns true if the current JXSearchField.LayoutStyle is JXSearchField.LayoutStyle.VISTA.
